page.title: 12Farming:
page.content: Unigate Dairy. St.Erth The dairy has a collection area which stretches from Lands End in the west, Hayle inthe east and the Lizard in the south, in this area there are 43O milk producers of which l8O farms produce a high yield milk. The milk is collected by 26 bulk carriers with capacities of either 9,OOO or l8,OOO litres. The annual total collection of milk totals approximately lOO,OOO,OOO litres with the peak of 37O.OOO litres on 2nd May l985. this figure is lower than for l983 and l984 owing to the E.E.C lower quotos now in operation. The whole operation generates some Â£l5 million per year into the local economy.
